name: Grit Design
tag_list: sizzlepig, saas, cloud, images, software, digital, web
overview:
Grit believes that brilliant work comes from a never say die work ethic and unrelenting curiosity. They accomplish that by finding new ways to do things smarter and faster, Grit just happens to make software, apps and websites.

The Grit team all have extensive digital experience and come from major Global Agencies such as Razorfish, Wunderman, Ogilvy and others.

And they know how to execute. Period.

Grit Design has been working on a new product line to help others in the field of digital communications. To ease the pains of production. To execute with speed not yet experienced and to do so with precision. To retain the integrity of design.

sizzlepig (sizzlepig.com) is the first to be released. This SaaS tool helped Grit solve problems they’ve had for years with creative and production.

It integrates directly with Dropbox and bridges the gap between multi-office production. It eliminates the needs for blind sizing scripts, provides accurate visual control of fine-tuning, cropping, compressing and scaling and controls naming conventions, eradicates timely re-touch issues and it lives in the cloud. It’s fast and it’s smart.

This is the first of many to come. All designed to help others create.
